high_descs: Take the orange pillow from the couch
Turn around, walk across the room
Put the pillow on the black arm chair
anns.task_desc: Take the pillow from the couch, put it on the arm chair

high_descs: Pick up the pillow on the couch.
Turn around and walk to the wall, then face the chair on the right.
Place the pillow on the chair cushion.
anns.task_desc: Place a pillow on a chair.

high_descs: Walk forward until you reach the couch.
Pick up the orange pillow from the couch.
Turn around and walk to the door.
Turn right, and place the pillow on the chair.
anns.task_desc: Move the pillow to the chair by the door.
